sqlquery.name: TplDealLink.BaseOn_Condition
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ C1 as LinkID, C700000057 as BaseOpenDateTime, C700020505 as LinkDesc, C700020504 as EndPhase, C700020592 as EndPoint, C700020523 as EndPort, C700020506 as Flag00IsAvail, C700020507 as Flag21Required, C700020501 as LinkBaseID, C700020502 as LinkBaseSchema, C700020508 as LinkFlagDuplicated, C700020525 as LinkGoLine, C700020526 as LinkNum, C700020521 as LinkPhaseNo, C700020044 as LinkType, C700020524 as LinkVerdictResult, C700020503 as StartPhase, C700020591 as StartPoint, C700020522 as StartPort /*COUNT*/ from {WF:App_TplDealLink} TplDealLink where $BaseOn_Condition$
